statements: DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 10000 AND expenses < 5000 OR profit < 0;
DELETE FROM risk_analysis_results WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM historical_financial_data WHERE id = 100 AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM risk_analysis_results WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND recommended_action = 'SELL';
DELETE FROM risk_metrics WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND beta > 1.5;
DELETE FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name = 'Market Volatility';
